caption.title: In situ TEM characterization of the CCNE nanocable during lithiation and delithiation.
caption.p: ( a) Schematic of the in situ TEM device. ( b) Time-lapse TEM images of single CCNE nanocable during lithiation and delithiation. ( c) Thickness variation curves of the CCNE nanocable during lithiation−delithiation cycles. Scale bar in b, 400 nm.
